ExpSyntax.val: 'Failed to get temporary filename: (' & Trim(Str({0,13},'')) & ') ' & Trim({0,14})

Text.valUnicode: If you press "Set", this program will set a byte order mark (BOM) at the beginning of the file, unless you specify "NONE" which will remove the BOM from the existing file (if there actually is one)
